cli

Class ExecutionContext.Common

  • java.lang.Object
    • cli.NativeObject
      • cli.ExecutionContext.Common
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionContext.Interface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExecutionContext.Native
    Enclosing class:
    ExecutionContext

    public abstract static class ExecutionContext.Common
extends NativeObject
implements ExecutionContext.Interface
    Common behaviours of non-blocking intput/output devices, whatever their location of implementation.

        Description copied from interface: ExecutionContext.Interface

      • stopExecution

        public final void stopExecution()
        Description copied from interface: ExecutionContext.Interface
        Terminates this execution context's execution. Warning: Not thread safe. Implement a non blocking device if your CLI execution should interact with external events.
        Specified by:
        stopExecution in interface ExecutionContext.Interface

      • stopAllExecutions

        public final void stopAllExecutions()
        Description copied from interface: ExecutionContext.Interface
        Terminates execution for all execution contexts attached to the same top execution context. Warning: Not thread safe. Implement a non blocking device if your CLI execution should interact with external events.
        Specified by:
        stopAllExecutions in interface ExecutionContext.Interface
